TuneVPS is one of the fastest growing Virtual Private Server (i.e. VPS) providers in webhosting industry with 99.9% uptime and best 24x7 technical Support.

**Some of our VPS Hosting Feature**

>• **RAID-10 storage**

>• Full root access

>• SolusVM VPS Control Panel

>• **Bandwidth, RAM & CPU Graph Monitoring**

>• TUN/TAP & PPP Support

>• 30 Days Money Back Guarantee

>• **1000Mbps port (shared)**

>• PTR Support

>• Enterprise Grade Hardware

>• Located in LosAngeles

>• **Weekly off-site backup**

>• **FREE & INSTANT SETUP**

>• INSTANT Resource Scalability

>• Latest OpenVZ 2.6.32 Kernel

>• Second-level Quotas enabled by default

>• Latest 32 & 64-bit Linux distributions available

ColoCrossing – Los Angeles, CA, USA

**256 MB VPS Offer**

• 15 GB RAID-10 Space

• 256 MB RAM+ vSwap

• 500 GB Monthly Bandwidth

• 1 IPv4 Address

• 2 CPU Core @ 3.4GHz

---- $15 Per Year----

[**(CLICK TO CONFIGURE & ORDER)**](https://billing.tunevps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=17)



------------------------------------------------------------------

**FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS**
------------------------------------------------------------------

• **What virtualization technology do you use?** All of our servers are running OpenVZ.

• **Do you provide support for TUN/TAP and PPP?** Yes.

• **What is the port speed of my VPS**? Each VPS is set up with a 1 GBPS port

• **Do you provide a money back guarantee?** Yes, as per your request we will issue you with a full refund within the first 30 days of service

• **Can I upgrade or downgrade my VPS at any time?**Yes, this can easily be done via our billing portal.

•**I've paid for my VPS, when will it be set up?** All VPS plans are instantly set up upon payment after you pass our automated fraud checks.

• **How much do you charge for additional IPv4 addresses?** We charge $2 per IP per month

• **What payment methods do you accept?** We accept payment via Payza and all credit cards via paypal.

• **Are there any contracts?** No. You can cancel at any time.

------------------------------------------------------------------

**IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS, contact us by using any following method.**
